issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: IssueDate reflects the date the document was issued.

series.title: Series
series.description: Series the referenced document belongs to.

code.title: Code
code.description: Source document's code or other identifier.

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: Line index numbers inside the document, if relevant.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description: List of additional codes, IDs, or SKUs which can be used to identify the document or its contents, agreed upon by the supplier and customer.

period.title: Period
period.description: Tax period in which the referred document had an effect required by some tax regimes and formats.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Human readable description on why this reference is here or needs to be used.

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Seals of approval from other organisations that may need to be listed.

ext.description: Extensions for additional codes that may be required.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Meta contains additional information about the document.

DocumentRef.description: DocumentRef is used to describe an existing document or a specific part of it's contents.
